Interface PacketPayload

All Known Implementing Classes:
PacketPayload.Ack, PacketPayload.ConnectAccept, PacketPayload.ConnectDeny, PacketPayload.ConnectRequest, PacketPayload.DisconnectNotice, PacketPayload.GamePacket, PacketPayload.PacketTypeRegistry, PacketPayload.Ping, PacketPayload.Pong, PacketPayload.ReconnectRequest, PacketPayload.SessionConfig
public interface PacketPayload
Base interface for all packet payloads.

This interface is intentionally non-sealed to allow custom payload implementations. Third-party code can implement this interface to define custom packet types for game-specific data.

To register a custom payload type:

  1. Implement this interface with a toBytes() method
  2. Provide a static fromBytes(byte[]) factory method
  3. Register the type using PayloadRegistry.register(byte, PayloadDeserializer)
See Also:
  • PayloadRegistry

    • sanitizeString

      static String sanitizeString(String input)
      Sanitizes a string by removing control characters and trimming whitespace. Control characters (0x00-0x1F and 0x7F-0x9F) can cause issues in logs and displays.
